author: radup
msg: Changed the meaning of all the short values in the .xsb format to unsigned short, thus increasing the size (in components) of the Schemas that can be processed and bringing it in line with the Java class format conventions.

author: dion
msg: Allow static methods to be executed on classes, e.g.
if the context contains: Boolean.class as 'variable',

author: dion
msg: Allow static methods to be executed on classes, e.g.
if the context contains: Boolean.class as 'variable',
